trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that extends <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> to specify whether errors are tolerated while loading a design document.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个接口来扩展<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref>来指定是否允许加载设计文档时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Use the IDesignerLoaderHost2 interface to specify whether the designer loader can continue loading when errors occur during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: IDesignerLoaderHost2 接口用于指定设计器加载程序是否可以继续加载反序列化期间发生错误时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is possible to reload with errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以重新加载错误。

trans-unit.source: In some scenarios, loading errors cannot be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，加载错误不能忽略。

trans-unit.source: The designer loader implementation should return `false` when this is the case.
trans-unit.target: 设计器加载程序实现应返回`false`时这种情况。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader can reload the design document when errors are detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果检测到错误; 时，设计器加载程序可以重新加载设计文档否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether errors should be ignored when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*> is called.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否错误应忽略时<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*>称为。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*>

trans-unit.source: The IgnoreErrorsDuringReload property can only be set to `true` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: IgnoreErrorsDuringReload 属性只能设置为`true`如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `false`, the value of IgnoreErrorsDuringReload is ignored.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader will ignore errors when it reloads; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果重新加载; 时，设计器加载程序将忽略错误否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
